00022 enum { ID_SHOW_LOG = 15000, ID_FULLSCREEN, ID_ABOUT, ID_CONFIG, ID_OGL_ABOUT };
00023 
00024 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(YardMain, wxFrame)
00025     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_MAIN_LOGOUT"), YardMain::OnLogout)
00026     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_MAIN_INVENTORY"), YardMain::OnInventory)
00027     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_MAIN_SALES"), YardMain::OnSale)
00028     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_MAIN_EMPLOYEE"), YardMain::OnEmployee)
00029     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_MAIN_CONFIG"), YardMain::OnOptions)
00030     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_MAIN_CUSTOMER"), YardMain::OnCustomer)
00031     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_MAIN_REPORTS"), YardMain::OnReports)
00032 
00033     EVT_MENU(ID_SHOW_LOG, YardMain::OnShowLog)
00034     EVT_MENU(ID_FULLSCREEN, YardMain::OnFullscreen)
00035     EVT_MENU(ID_ABOUT, YardMain::OnAbout)
00036     EVT_MENU(ID_CONFIG, YardMain::OnOptions)
00037     EVT_MENU(ID_OGL_ABOUT, YardMain::OnAboutGL)
00038 
00039     EVT_CLOSE(YardMain::OnClose)
00040 END_EVENT_TABLE()
00041 
00042 YardMain::YardMain(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& title,
00043                    const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style, const wxString& name)
00044 :wxFrame(parent, id, title, pos, size, style, name) {
00045     
00046     wxXmlResource::Get()->Load("res/main.xrc");
00047     wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "Main");
00048     wxSizer * sizer = panel->GetSizer();
00049     sizer->SetSizeHints(this);
00050     SetSize(sizer->GetMinSize());
00051     Centre();
00052     if (wxGetApp().Full())
00053         ShowFullScreen(true);
00054     
00055     //ShowFullScreen(true,  wxFULLSCREEN_ALL);
00056     
00057     wxAcceleratorEntry entries[5];
00058     entries[0].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL,  (int) 'L',     ID_SHOW_LOG);
00059     entries[1].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL,  (int) 'F',     ID_FULLSCREEN);
00060     entries[2].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL, (int) 'A',     ID_ABOUT);
00061     entries[3].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL,  (int) 'C',    ID_CONFIG);
00062     entries[4].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL, (int) 'G',     ID_OGL_ABOUT);
00063     wxAcceleratorTable accel(5, entries);
00064     SetAcceleratorTable(accel);
00065     
00066     m_log = new YardDebugScreen(this, -1, 
00067         wxT("Debug"), wxPoint(0,50));
00068 #ifdef __WXDEBUG___
00069     m_log->Show();
00070 #endif
00071     
00072     wxLogDebug(wxT("Main loaded..."));
00073 }
00074 
00075 YardMain::~YardMain()
00076 {
00077 }

00079 void YardMain::OnShowLog(wxCommandEvent& event)
00080 {
00081     wxLogDebug(wxT("OnShowLog"));
00082     if (m_log->IsShown())
00083         m_log->Show(false);
00084     else
00085         m_log->Show(true);
00086 }
00087     
00088 void YardMain::OnFullscreen(wxCommandEvent& event)
00089 {
00090     wxLogDebug(wxT("OnShowFullscreen"));
00091     if (IsFullScreen())
00092     {
00093         wxGetApp().SetFull(false);
00094         ShowFullScreen(false);
00095     }
00096     else
00097     {
00098         wxGetApp().SetFull(true);
00099         ShowFullScreen(true);
00100     }
00101 }
00102     
00103 void YardMain::OnAbout(wxCommandEvent& event)
00104 {
00105     wxLogDebug(wxT("OnAbout"));
00106     wxMessageBox("YardSale: The Open Point of Sale\n\n"
00107                 "Copyright (c) 2004 - Jesse Lovelace", "About YardSale",
00108                             wxOK, this);    
00109 }
00110

00112 {
00113 
00114     YardAboutGL * about = new YardAboutGL(this, -1, wxT("About YardSale"));
00115     about->ShowModal();
00116     about->Destroy();

00179 void YardMain::OnClose(wxCloseEvent& event)
00180 {
00181     if (event.CanVeto()) // if this isnt a forced close, load login
00182         wxGetApp().ShowLogin(this);
00183     else
00184         Destroy(); //otherwise destroy window and children    
00185 }
